name: Credited service at retirement
text: §88-71  Credited service at retirement.  Credited service at retirement on which the retirement allowance of a member shall be based shall consist of the member's membership service, the member's credit for unused sick leave as provided in section 88-63, and the member's prior service, if any, as provided in this part. [L 1925, c 55, pt of §4; RL 1935, pt of §7923; RL 1945, pt of §704; am L 1945, c 73, pt of §1(c); am L 1947, c 140, §1(c); RL 1955, §6-40; am L 1964, c 62, §3; HRS §88-61; am L 1969, c 110, pt of §1; am L 1975, c 177, §2; gen ch 1985]
